channel.title: Really bored - Project ideas?
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Ya i'm really really really bored lol, nothinn to do at all now so i just thought i'd make a thread see what you guys are doing ? xD
I need something to do, so just give me some suggestions, Any good games etc? Or maybe you've got an idea for a project but you can't do it yourself.
Just tell me please, i want to start a project but don't know at all what, since most people already done a load of things, Theres a lot of great clients out, servers, tobias with his Tobex webclient project, i just need some ideas! I'm pretty good with both Java and PHP, so preferably something to do with those two languages xD
I'm sure someones got some good ideas?

item.title: Really bored - Project ideas?

YOU SHOULD MAKE A SERBER JUST LIKE RUNESCAPE LOLOLOLOL!!!111111111

I would insult you here, but your post insults itself.
[/quote]

Shame you can’t sense sarcasm in a post =/[/quote] I can sense sarcasm, just not always see humour in it.

Read full topic

no
·#·$39 Jσsннuα·$™ ·& • I act like shit don’t phase me, inside it drives me crazy! says:

You also asked 'Lewk. It’s just a number that’s under your username; it’s too easily earned on this side of the forum.[/quote]

Hmm Hey josh do u know who this is?

item.title: Really bored - Project ideas?
item.dc:creator: @C51 C5
item.description:
@C51 wrote:

Lol i’ve done that alot, made an SMF forum, modded a lot, made loads of servers, but now it’s all the same, and gets boring. I need good ideas for projects, something either useful or educational…

I even made a website for minigames in PHP (http://eliteplay.co.uk/), I’m not pro at PHP, but i can achieve some pretty good things. Maybe i could extend on it, add more features etc. Or a brand new project, idk.

Read full topic
